arrayGenerator

Class ArrayGeneratorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • arrayGenerator.ArrayGeneratorTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListingGeneratorTest

    abstract class ArrayGeneratorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    A tester class for ArrayGenerators. This class defines a single tester method, that can be used to check that array generators generate arrays of the required size, and uses this to define some simple size tests. Implementing classes should implement getGenerator to return an array generator of the relevant type.
    Version:
    September 2020
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Method Detail

      • getGenerator

        protected abstract ArrayGenerator getGenerator(int size)
        Get an array generator to be tested. This is used by the testContents method. Different implementations of can define this method to return a listing generator of the required type.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the listing to be generated by the generator.
        Returns:
        a listing generator that will create a listing of the required size.

      • testSize

        public void testSize(int size)
        Check that the generator generates arrays of the required size.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of array to be generated.
